title: Rebellion Book II: Book of Soung
description: What if the person you could trust the least was yourself? Although Lord and Lady Choi had promised each other that there would be no more secrets between them, no more lies, neither of them was capable of holding to the bargain. He still had his secrets and she still had hers. While Lady Choi loved her husband with everything she had in her, she would never be foolish enough to trust him again, would put nothing past him. When new enemies and old ones ally to seek revenge, the very foundations of their faith in one another is shaken to the core. As old lies unravel, new deceptions are revealed and old insecurities resurface, can a love without trust survive?---------------------------------------------Rebellion is a steamy, romantic, historical saga set in Qing Dynasty China that is centered around a feisty princess with repressed memories and her tempestuous relationship with her roguish kidnapper.
author: Grea Alexander
